message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $115. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $100 for the product. Would that be possible?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original asking price. Would you consider $110?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I'm willing to go up to $105 for the product. Would that be acceptable?
